CorelsSummary.Name: Core Logic System (Corels)
CorelsSummary.CoreConcept: A simple, accessible ethical framework to guide daily life and foster unity across all people.

Basis.Nature: Built on timeless human values, not new or complex, shared across cultures for centuries.

Elements.Nature: Six guiding principles that work together dynamically, like a balanced whole.

List.Name: Honour or Duty
List.Description: Act with care for family, friends, past, and future, in ways that feel right to you.

List.Name: Fairness
List.Description: Treat everyone equally, avoiding favoritism or unfair power.

List.Name: Kindness
List.Description: Be friendly, help others, and listen to their perspectives.

List.Name: Wisdom
List.Description: Think carefully, choose wisely for the long term, and keep learning.

List.Name: Balance/Harmony
List.Description: Find peace in life, work together, and respect differences.

List.Name: Respectful Actions
List.Description: Show dignity to others, honoring their ways and privacy.

Elements.DynamicNature: These principles adapt and support each other, growing with your experiences.

Basis.AnthropologicalBasis: Addresses a modern drift from basic human values, which can lead to stress and division.

DesignPhilosophy.KeyDriver: Made for everyone to understand and use, avoiding complicated ideas.
DesignPhilosophy.CommunicationApproach: Explained simply, with examples from everyday life to make it clear.

IntendedPracticalUse.Goal: Offer a guide for personal choices and building a better community.
IndividualImpact: Easy to apply in daily life.

SocietalImpact.Function: Grows stronger as more people use it together.
SocietalImpact.ResponseToHarm: Allows fair protection against harm to self or others.
SocietalImpact.EffectOnPractices: Reduces unfair habits as more people join in.
SocietalTransformationModel: Stage 1: People start using Corels in their lives.
Stage 2: Others follow by seeing its value.
Stage 3: Corels shapes a united society.
SocietalImpact.HopeForTransition: Wishes for a smooth change with little conflict.
SocietalImpact.OverallOutcome: Aims for a society where these values guide everyone.

WhatCorelsIsNot: Not meant to force anyone to agree.
Not a strict rulebook above all else.
ConstraintsAndSafeguards.BasisForConstraints: Learned from past mistakes where forcing beliefs caused harm.

Compatibility.UniversalDeclarationOfHumanRights: Works well with basic human rights ideas.
Compatibility.ExistingBeliefs: Fits with many ways of thinking, respecting differences.

CorelsSummary.RoleInOverallSystem: A starting point to build a fair and open society for all.
